body: Telazol powder is reconstituted with 2.5 mL of dexmedetomidine and 2.5 mL of butorphanol (10 mg/mL) to form final volume of 5 mL Purevax is recommended to be administered at 8 wk, then every 3 wk for 3 doses. c Vaccinations are generally administered at 2-3 wk intervals until the ferret is 12-14 wk of age. d Only a killed virus vaccine (Imrab 3, Rhône Merieux) should be used. Vaccines should be separated by several days to reduce vaccine reactions. e In previously unvaccinated adults, an initial series of two vaccinations given 14-28 days apart should be given.
